message: This makes me so sad

according to the USSC there are NO peace officers in the USA only law officers that work for them and not us. ripp your head out of your ass when ever have you seen an officer """"keep"""" or """"spread"""" peace
If running out of beer and coke is their biggest newsworthy problem, then everyone move along, there's nothing to see here. Call me when they run out of food and water.

Lol I think you got what I was saying all wrong! Maybe you need to read what you just said to me! They are saying he killed himself and on top of it painted him as a hero,now they are saying he is all these bad things or was,cops can be dirty you you feel me? They do illegal stuff all the time and if him and others on the force we're dealing in criminal activity and look by this picture he looks like a thug,never judge a person by the looks or what the media puts out,maybe he knew to much,is what I am saying maybe he was actually murdered. And what does me owning a gun have to do with me wondering if it were foul play? Is your family member on this police force or are you looking for a argument or a race comment? If not go back to school and learn what words mean because darling you just misinterpreted what I said all the down the line. I do not support criminals and I do not support cops being brutal and I sure as hell do not support people trying to make good cops look bad,and I do not support arguing over bs and arguing over something someone read all wrong. I know what comment you are looking for here and not gonna get it,go sit on your soap box and stop trolling.
Marco your correct! This guy is a real con artist
Megan, us.
We want, and need to see the body cam footage.

Dear Santa, please don't bother visiting the Netherlands this Xmas. The one and only Sinterklaas already brought us tons of presents on December 5th. You know we consider you a cheep Cola-copy anyway. Apart from that, the reindeer-stuff you do is cool. But please give the Dutch present to the children in Syria and Jemen
You my dear are definitely an inspiration to all! Congratulations!
Ya sure!

Funny people are just now starting to remember who Donald Trump is. He has been famous for lying, and cheating people since the 70's. Fake for profit university, not paying hundreds of contractors, bankrupt multiple times, numerous fair housing violations, all of his products are made in oversea sweat shops, prostitutes, and drugs. Not to mention he is so bad he doesn't want us to see his tax returns because he has lied about all his business dealings with Russia, and the middle east. Hello people Donald Trump has always been a giant piece of crap, he just fooled a conservative generation into forgetting all the facts about him...
